## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                                              | Type                                                                                                                                               | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `backgroundColor` | `background-color` | The bootstrap background color scheme to use, e.g. primary, default, ... | `"danger" \| "default" \| "gray" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning" \| undefined`                                     | `'primary'` |
| `text`            | `text`             | The text to display in the ribbon                                        | `string \| undefined`                                                                                                                              | `undefined` |
| `textColor`       | `text-color`       | The bootstrap text color scheme to use, e.g. primary, default, ...       | `"black" \| "charcoal" \| "danger" \| "default" \| "gray" \| "info" \| "paper" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning" \| undefined` | `'default'` |
